message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DB. 

The paper discusses the use of a content-based classifier to filter out spam from a large web dataset, which is a common problem in information retrieval (cs.IR) and computer security (cs.CR). The use of machine learning techniques to improve ranking also falls under artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper deals with the management and processing of large datasets, which is relevant to database systems (cs.DB).
